hero_description: Your privacy is our priority! In our Privacy Policy, you will find details on how we collect, process, and protect your personal data.
hero_background_alt: Photo of a shelf with metal elements
section_1_icon_alt: Icon of a person with a gear
section_1_description_p: This Privacy Policy outlines the principles of processing and protecting personal data provided by users in connection with using the website https://pol-med.tech. The data controller is:
section_2_icon_alt: Icon of a paper with a human profile
section_2_description_p_1: The collection and processing of users' personal data are conducted in accordance with applicable laws, particularly with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (GDPR).
section_2_description_p_2: We do not collect any personal data provided on the website https://pol-med.tech without the user's explicit consent.
section_2_description_p_3: Our site is equipped with an SSL certificate, which means that all transmitted information is encrypted and protected from unauthorized access.
section_3_title: 3. Purpose and Scope of Processing Personal Data
section_3_icon_alt: Icon of a target with an arrow
section_3_description_p_1: If a user voluntarily provides us with their personal data (for example, in a contact form or for subscribing to a newsletter), we will process this data solely for the purpose specified at the time of collection. The personal data provided to us will not be shared with third parties or used for marketing purposes without the user's explicit consent.
section_4_description_p_1: Our website may use traffic analysis tools such as Google Analytics to collect anonymous information about website traffic. This data is used solely for statistical purposes and to improve the quality of our service. It does not allow for the identification of individual users.
section_5_icon_alt: Icon of a server computer with a cloud
section_5_description_p_1: The website https://pol-med.tech is maintained using GitHub Pages infrastructure, which provides a high level of security and data protection. GitHub offers advanced monitoring and version control systems that facilitate tracking changes and preventing potential security incidents. Additionally, the source code of the site is open and available at: https://github.com/muslewski/pol-med.tech. Public access to the code ensures transparency and supports continuous improvement of the site.
section_6_icon_alt: Icon of a hand pointing to people
section_6_description_p_1: In accordance with GDPR, users have the right to access their personal data, correct, delete, or restrict its processing, as well as the right to data portability and to object to the processing of their personal data. Any questions or requests regarding personal data should be directed to the email address: biuro@pol-med.tech.
section_7_description_p_1: We reserve the right to change the Privacy Policy to adapt it to changing needs and legal regulations. The current version of the Privacy Policy will always be available at: https://pol-med.tech/polityka_prywatnosci
